casebody.data:
NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY
v.
Timothy Glenn GASKILL and Lester R. Mitchum. No. 268P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. J. Jefferson Newton, Beaufort, Raymond E. Dunn, Jr., New Bern, for Lester R. Mitchum. William Robert Cherry, Jr., Wilmington, for Nationwide Mutual Ins. Co. Timothy Glenn Gaskill, Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 16th day of May 2006 by Defendant (Lester R. Mitchum) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th day of December 2006."
